title: The 50 most important interpretations of a dream about a gift of gold for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a gift of gold for a married woman. Commentators believe that the dream is good and carries many omens for the dreamer, but in some cases it leads to evil. It leads to his good relationship with this person who cares for him. It is said that giving gold bullion as a gift in a dream symbolizes hearing happy news about a friend in the near future. Amazing in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about a gift of gold for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a married partner giving her a gold necklace indicates his attachment to her, loves her very much, and does everything in his power to please her, and soon their financial situation will change dramatically. If the dreamer dreams that Her partner was giving her gold bullion and she was not a mother, so she brings good news of an imminent pregnancy and the birth of a beautiful child which will be a good thing in her life. An unknown person offering the dreamer a white gold ring means that she will receive a promotion at work and her circumstances will change for the better in the near future. Urgent: The gift of yellow gold in a dream symbolizes a feeling of happiness and satisfaction, the return of the traveler, alleviation of distress and the removal of problems and worries. title: Interpretation of seeing stars shining in the sky in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the stars in a dream by Imam al-SadiqImam al-Sadiq says about it: Seeing the stars in the dreamer’s house with their light extinguished indicates the misfortunes that will befall the dreamer. Also, seeing the stars falling into the sea may indicate that a member of the dreamer’s family has drowned in the sea, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about stars falling into the sea A dream about the appearance of unpleasant things for the dreamer. Owning and possessing stars in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s high status in his life. Seeing the stars changing their place is a sign of success, success, and achieving goals, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing stars for a single woman. Seeing stars in a dream for a single woman indicates Many interpretations and indicators that we will explain to you in detail. To see stars shining in the sky in a dream for single people means that you will hear happy news and achieve goals and ambitions. But seeing dark and extinguished stars in a girl’s dream indicates the many worries and problems that the girl will face in her next life, and God I know. Seeing stars falling from the sky in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the emergence of problems and abhorrent things in the dreamer’s home, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing stars in a dream for a married woman. Seeing stars in a married woman’s dream indicates the fulfillment of the desires and goals that the woman seeks in her life. Seeing bright stars in a married woman’s dream means happiness, a lot of livelihood, and hearing happy news, and God knows best. Also, seeing stars in a married woman’s dream indicates a good situation for her, her husband, and her children, and God knows best. Stars in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing bright stars in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates ease. Giving birth to a fetus and enjoying its health and well-being. Seeing stars in a dream for a pregnant woman means that her fetus will be healthy, and God knows best. Also, seeing stars in a dream for a pregnant woman can be good news for giving birth to a male child, and God knows what is in the wombs. Seeing sparkling stars in a dream A pregnant woman is one of the dreams that deserve praise and that indicates her livelihood, goodness, health, and child, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Looking at the sky and the stars in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the stars in the sky and looking at them in a dream is a sign of kindness and a happy life in the neighborhood. Seeing the sky in a dream and seeing the stars is considered It is one of the desired visions and hearing good news. Seeing the stars shining in the sky in a dream. The interpretation of seeing the stars shining in the sky in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates great happiness for her in this world. Seeing the stars shining in a dream also indicates the improvement of all situations and the end of sorrows and worries. Seeing The stars of the Pleiades in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a chandelier in a dream for a married woman is evidence of getting rid of problems and difficulties in her life. Seeing the stars of the Pleiades in a dream indicates blessing in this world and the right path, and it is a sign of guidance. If you have a dream and want it interpreted, put it in a comment below. A team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: The most important interpretations of seeing agriculture in a dream

preview.html: Agriculture in a dreamAgriculture, in reality, is good, and there is no doubt that seeing it in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that its companions herald the abundance of blue water, but are there other interpretations? Scientists have answered this question with hundreds of different cases of seeing agriculture in a dream. It can be green, it can be dry and yellow, and here other indicators appear. If you are interested in researching this vision, you can continue reading this article. Agriculture in a dream Scientists offer us many different interpretations of seeing agriculture in a dream, the most important of which are: The interpretation of a dream about agriculture in the form of work indicates good meanings such as establishing a new business, marriage, And pregnancy. Green planting in a dream is good and a blessing in the diet, money, health and good offspring. Seeing dry yellow plantings is disturbing, it may indicate poverty or illness. A sick person’s dream of a transplant is news of recovery and a normal life. Seeing a wealthy fortune teller planting in his dream indicates Expanding his business and increasing his projects. Farming in a dream for the poor is good and good news of wealth and well-being after drought and hardship. If an oppressed young man dreams that he is farming in a fertile land, his innocence will be revealed and he will gain his freedom, while farming in a barren land may alert him to a long period of imprisonment. Farming in a dream by Ibn Sirin. What Ibn Sirin said in interpreting the dream of agriculture? Ibn Sirin said in interpreting the vision of agriculture as an indication of pregnancy in a married woman’s dream. Agriculture in a dream for a person is a sign of the blessed marriage of a righteous girl. Seeing a student grazing in a dream foretells that he will reap the fruits of his efforts and fulfill his desires. And he fulfills his dreams. Seeing land planted with wheat in a man’s dream is a sign of abundant sustenance and abundance of lawful money. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of watering plants in a dream as good news for a married woman who was late in giving birth, and God will bless her with children that please her in her eyes. Fertile agricultural land in a dream Married symbolizes his righteous wife and his righteous offspring. Agriculture in a single woman’s dream: We find in the interpretations of a single woman who sees agriculture in her dream indications that may have positive or negative meanings, such as: Scientists agree that seeing agriculture in a single woman’s dream generally indicates her thinking about engagement and marriage. Seeing a girl planted in green land is a sign that she will find a wonderful job opportunity. It is said that the dreamer seeing the planted land burning in her dream warns her of a conspiracy being hatched against her and she must be careful and vigilant. As for the single woman who uproots her crops in her dream, this indicates her disobedience to her parents and not treating them well. Harvesting crops in an unmarried woman’s dream after ripening heralds happy good news, while the fading of the seed in her dream could warn her of her worries and problems that are disturbing her psychologically. Ibn Shaheen says that the girl walking among green farms in her dream symbolizes the company of good people and good company. Agriculture In a dream for a married woman: Agriculture in a dream for a married woman is good, but not in all cases, as we see: If a married woman sees that she

It is one of the types of fruit that, if seen in a dream, carries many associations, good and good positive signs, which have been explained by many experts and scholars. Interpretation of dreams, and during this paragraph we will explain to you the interpretation of a dream about seeing pears or pears in a dream is also: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is buying pears. This is evidence that this girl has many ambitions and dreams and she is striving to achieve them. In the event that the person with the vision is going through a state of Stress, anxiety, and sadness. Seeing pears in a dream is good news to get rid of all those negative feelings. While pears in a girl’s dream are evidence of this girl’s excellence in her studies. He also obtained excellent marks in this study. In addition, seeing pears in a dream for a girl It is a sign of the good luck that awaits her in her life in general. title: Interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Fish is also a common dream that has many different meanings and interpretations, and most of the time it is a praiseworthy vision, and through this article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and... All interpretations and signs related to this. Eating fried fish in a dream for a married woman. Seeing eating fish in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation is a good vision and good news for all types of fish except sharks and whales. If a married woman sees her husband offering her fried fish, this is a sign of the approaching pregnancy, and she will give birth. A healthy and beautiful child will bring him nourishment and peace of mind, God willing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a stream without rain by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about eating grilled fish with the dead. Seeing eating grilled fish in a dream with the deceased, whether we know the deceased or not, is a blessing and a praiseworthy vision, and its importance is not limited to Whoever sees the dream, rather in the neighborhood in which he resides. . Performing a benefit for the neighborhood and paying a debt or a large inheritance brings happiness, food, and joy, and that brings joy, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish for a divorced woman. A divorced woman’s dream of eating fried fish portends the end of her marital problems through settling the dispute, reuniting her with her husband, and reaching an agreement between them, or God Almighty compensating her with a husband. Another contains it and replaces it. What she experienced in the previous period and her disappointment. Interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish for a single woman: The vision of eating fried fish for single people is considered a good omen and a good sign, and since there is joy that the girl will gain from commentators, whoever sees it is linked to obtaining a good husband who will make her happy and bring her. Her peace, and many argued that it could fulfill her desire and security, such as finding a job, as it is a source of livelihood that comes her way. It brings her happiness. See also: Interpretation of dreams about eating cake for unmarried, pregnant, married and divorced women. Eating fish in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. According to Imam Al-Sadiq, seeing fish in a dream and eating it, whether raw, grilled or fried, is good news in the multiplicity of forms and types of goodness through the reference Next attached: Here we are the most beautiful for you, dear followers, the interpretation of seeing eating fish in a dream, and we can comment to you in general that fish in a dream is good news, abundant food and happiness, according to the situation and category that saw the dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person for a single married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a person by Ibn Sirin: There are many hidden dreams that a person can see in his sleep, and they are the dreams that worry him when he wakes up from his sleep, due to his lack of knowledge of the correct and complete interpretation of what he saw in his dream, especially since dreams are a sign from God Almighty for all Of the good and evil that will happen in the real life of a person, and many were interested in knowing the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about the death of a living person. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a person by Ibn Sirin. The translator Ibn Sirin was able to write all the interpretations of dreams that a person can see in a dream, and he is the one who is interested in determining their interpretation. Complete and correct, as we will provide the interpretation of a dream about a person’s death. Alive from Ibn Sirin through the following: Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing a person alive and dead in a dream is evidence that he will get rid of the enemies around him. Ibn Sirin also explained that seeing a dead person alive, whether the mother or father in a dream, is evidence that poverty And distress will prevail over the dreamer. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a dead person alive, who is the imam of a mosque in a dream, is evidence that he lives in a place full of corruption, and he must stay away from it. In addition, Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a dead body alive but not buried in a dream is evidence of... That one will be able to defeat the enemy without suffering losses. See also: I dreamed that I was pregnant while I was single.. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person for one person. There are many dreams that an unmarried girl can see in her sleep, and they are the result of Her subconscious vision of her dreams, as we will present the interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person through the things represented in the following: If a single girl sees the death of one of her family members while he is alive in a dream, this means that she will be able to get rid of all the problems and fears in her life. Also If an unmarried girl sees the death of her sister while she is alive in a dream, this means that she will receive a series of happy and joyful news for her. If an unmarried girl sees the death of her fiancé while he is alive in a dream, this means that the date of the Qur’anic contract is approaching. In addition to Therefore, if an unmarried girl sees the death of her brother while he is alive in a dream, this indicates that she will hear a lot of happy news about her in the near future. See also: The interpretation of seeing a dinosaur in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the great commentators. The interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person for a man. There is a belief among some People say that men do not dream often, but this is a misconception because men have a large share in seeing dreams and interpreting them, and we will also present the interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person. Person to man from the following points: If a man sees the death of a living person in a dream, this means that he will hear a series of good and happy news in the near future. Also, if a man sees the death of a living person, who is his father, in a dream, this means that he will undergo a series of changes. In his life. If a man sees the death of his alive relative in a dream, this indicates that the deceased will have a long life.

Interpretation of a dream about the death of a person by Ibn Sirin. The translator Ibn Sirin was able to write all the interpretations of dreams that a person can see in a dream, and he is the one who is interested in determining their interpretation. Complete and correct, as we will provide the interpretation of a dream about a person’s death. Alive from Ibn Sirin through the following: Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing a person alive and dead in a dream is evidence that he will get rid of the enemies around him. Ibn Sirin also explained that seeing a dead person alive, whether the mother or father in a dream, is evidence that poverty And distress will prevail over the dreamer. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a dead person alive, who is the imam of a mosque in a dream, is evidence that he lives in a place full of corruption, and he must stay away from it. In addition, Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a dead body alive but not buried in a dream is evidence of... That one will be able to defeat the enemy without suffering losses. title: Interpretation of seeing spots in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing freckles in a dream symbolizes basic problems and concerns, and whoever sees freckles on his face means that he will face difficult things in his life, and in general there is no good in them, especially red and black. Interpretation of seeing spots in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained that seeing spots in a dream is a problem and many Worries: Whoever sees spots on his body in a dream, this indicates diseases and pain, and seeing spots on the face in a dream means self-reproach and a dark conscience for an act committed by the dreamer. It indicates anxiety. If you see spots appearing and disappearing from the body in a dream, this means fatigue that does not last long, and whoever sees swollen spots on the body in a dream, this means that you are collecting prohibited money, and treating the spots in a dream. Evidence that he is trying to escape from problems and fears. The appearance of spots on the body due to illness in a dream indicates weakness and bad circumstances, and if you see spots on your body after being beaten in a dream, it means that you heard insulting words. Seeing white spots on the nails in a dream shows the power of the fortuneteller And after looking, whoever sees white spots in his mouth in a dream, this indicates that he speaks words of praise and praise, and a dream of white spots on the tongue indicates the dreamer’s eloquence and knowledge. Seeing marks on the body of a dead person in a dream indicates his need for prayer and seeking forgiveness, and whoever sees spots appearing on the face of a dead person in a dream, this It indicates his bad memory after his death, and if you see spots on the hand of a dead person in a dream, this indicates the inheritance he leaves from an illegitimate source. Interpretation of seeing freckles and melasma in a dream. Seeing freckles in a dream means that you have fallen into sin, and whoever sees freckles appearing on his face in a dream, this means That he reviews the difficulties of things and sees the disappearance of freckles and melasma for a person who already suffers from freckles in a dream indicates improved conditions and seeing freckles in another person. A person in a dream shows the bad morals of that person. Seeing freckles on the forehead in a dream means lack of life and honor, and whoever sees freckles on his cheek in a dream, this indicates the emergence of problems with a loved one. If you see a freckle on your right hand in a dream, this indicates defects. In worship, seeing freckles on your left hand in a dream means that you have committed a shameful act. Seeing freckles on the neck in a dream means many debts, and whoever sees freckles covering his entire body in a dream, this indicates many worries and sorrows, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about spots on the skin: The appearance of spots indicates Skin in a dream means revealing something, and revealing secrets. Whoever dreams of spots appearing on the skin of someone he knows, this indicates the discovery of something he is hiding, and seeing spots on the skin of a stranger in a dream indicates the emergence of obstacles and difficulties in his search, and dreaming of spots on the skin of a relative indicates the discovery of deception. A relative. The appearance of small spots on the skin in a dream indicates problems that do not last, and whoever dreams of large spots on his skin, this indicates distress and crises. The fear of spots appearing on the skin in a dream indicates the dreamer’s anxiety about revealing his secret, and whoever sees that he went to see a doctor When spots appear on his skin in a dream, this indicates seeking pain

title: Interpretation of seeing the bride in a dream in detail

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of seeing the bride in a dream in detail. The bride is a carnivorous mammal and is characterized by light brown fur. As for the light-colored abdominal area, it is bright white, and the bride is characterized by her quick movement. And everyone wants to know the correct interpretation of this dream. Interpretation of seeing the bride at home. The vision shows people close to the dreamer who have bad and hateful qualities and also want to harm the dreamer. Entering into marriage. Returning home in a dream indicates problems, quarrels, and difficult issues that people face at home. The vision also suggests that you hear Bad news or falling into distress. Seeing a bride in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes anxiety and a feeling of fear, as well as a feeling of insecurity because of those around her. If the bride cannot leave the house, this is a sign that she is facing many difficulties and problems. The spread of multiple marriages indicates To discord and lies. It also symbolizes an epidemic or the spread of a disease. A dream about a pregnant woman indicates the pain she feels during childbirth that will quickly disappear. Seeing a daughter-in-law eating at home indicates a treacherous father, as well as her hatred for the people of the house. Seeing a married woman in this dream It is a sign of the presence of an evil person who is trying to cause her problems regardless of his hatred for her. Who saw a wedding in a dream? The vision shows that the dreamer knows the oppressor, because he gets his right. It indicates the presence of marriage in bed, and this leads to problems between the man and his wife, as the wife deviates About the will of her husband, and God knows best. In a dream, the bride also meets the enemies surrounding her in the form of friends. Seeing marriage in general indicates injustice and corruption. The death of the bride in a dream is evidence of earning abundant money in addition to goodness and blessing in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing the bride In a dream, see the point of marriage, they express feelings of fear about the future, as well as anxiety about losing a job. As the dream is expressed in the dream of an unmarried young man, he carries the traits of a difficult nature, as well as not giving in to problems, and he is determined to implement what he wants. The married man who sees marriage in his bed Evidence that he is married to a difficult woman. Since the vision says that someone close is trying to destroy his house, he should be careful. Seeing the bride in the kitchen indicates financial difficulties and warns against accidental wasting of money. Interpretation of a dream about getting married from home. The bride leaving the house in a dream indicates Eliminating stress and sadness. The vision symbolizes paying off debts and satisfying needs in addition to facilitating the financial situation. For a married woman, seeing this dream means the end of the argument with her husband, as well as getting rid of the period of distress that she is going through. An unmarried young man in his dream indicates that he will find a suitable job and that the distance from The people around him in his life begin with the beginning of a new period. The vision also portends excellence in study and work. If a man sees his bride leaving his home, this is a sign of the abundance of livelihood that he will have after the experiences he has gone through. Interpretation

title: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet’s grave in a dream

preview.html: So we will explain to you many interpretations of seeing the grave of the Messenger, as well as crying over the grave, in addition to the movement of the grave of the Messenger, please follow us. Interpretation of seeing the grave of the Prophet in a dream When a person sees himself in a dream, he is about to visit the grave of the Messenger of God. It is an expression of the great sustenance that opens up to him, whether that sustenance is from his money, his work, or his birth, and God knows best. But when the dreamer sees himself visiting the grave of the beloved Messenger and water comes out of the shrine. This is evidence that the dreamer is following the example of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in doing his Sunnah and following good and staying away from disobedience and sins. The vision in which the dreamer sees that he passed by the grave of our Master, the Messenger of God. It is an expression of the dreamer's prayers that reach him constantly. The merchant who sees the grave of the Messenger of God in his sleep. Evidence that he will earn a lot of livelihood, and God knows best. As for the one who dreams that he is one of the sons of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. This is evidence and a sign from God Almighty that he is a righteous and strong person in religion. As for the person if he sees the grave of the Messenger in a dream and it has fractures and is not natural, it is an expression of the weakness of the faith of the owner of the dream and his distance from the path of God Almighty. In general This vision is considered one of the most promising and praiseworthy visions for its owner, which gives the preachers food, mercy and blessings to its owner, and God knows best. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of the Prophet’s grave. The vision in which the dreamer sees the grave of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, is evidence of the dreamer’s piety and application of the Sunnah of the Prophet. As for when he sees the Messenger in the form of a young man, it is an expression of the existence of a war that will lead people to the point of killing. But when one sees that our beloved Messenger has been born again. It is an expression of the weakness of the dreamer’s faith. The patient who dreams that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, is sick. It is evidence of our imminent recovery that we are suffering from an illness, and God knows best. Whoever dreams that he visited the grave of the Messenger and found one of the wives of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. It is evidence of the extent of the dreamer’s faith and his following of his Messenger. Whoever visits the Prophet’s grave in a dream and is overwhelmed by a wonderful and distinctive view is evidence of the increase in his faith. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream Seeing the funeral of the Prophet in a dream Interpreters and jurists believe that whoever sees the funeral of the Messenger in a dream. It is evidence that the dreamer will be exposed to a great calamity, God forbid. The dream also The funeral of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, is an expression of something that people are exposed to. Either war or a great experience, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the grave of the Messenger in a dream for a man The man who dreams of the grave of the Messenger is a businessman or a merchant, and it is evidence of an increase in his money in the coming period and an improvement in his financial situation. Seeing the grave of the Messenger for a man may mean that he will perform Hajj soon. A dream in which a man sees himself reciting Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream near the grave of the Messenger of God is evidence that his desires will be fulfilled and that he will be able to reach everything he wants. If the man is barren and sees the grave of the Messenger of God, this is good news that he will give birth soon, and God knows best. As for the case of a single man, seeing the grave of the Messenger is evidence that God Almighty will bless him with a good and just girl in the coming days. What is the interpretation?

Al-Fatihah in a dream near the grave of the Messenger of God is evidence that his desires will be fulfilled and that he will be able to achieve everything he wants. If a man is barren and sees the grave of the Messenger of God, this is good news for him that she will give birth soon, and God knows best. As for the case of the man who is single, seeing the grave of the Messenger is evidence that God Almighty will bless him with a good and fair girl in the coming days. What do you think?

title: Interpretation of seeing space in a dream in detail

preview.html: Space in a dream symbolizes improvement in conditions and progress in affairs, and whoever sees that he is boarding a spaceship in a dream, this indicates his courage and risk to achieve goals, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing space in a dream: Seeing space in a dream indicates a harbinger of attaining position, height, and location. Perhaps seeing space in a dream means travel. Outside the country where there is good and benefit for the dreamer, the dream of conquering space shows strife and slander from those who have envy and enemies, and whoever sees that he is flying. In the space between the planets in a dream, this indicates an increase in affairs and circumstances. Seeing a flying saucer in a dream indicates the discovery of new things, a space rocket in a dream symbolizes sudden changes in the viewer’s life, and a dream about launching a space rocket indicates wisdom in work and striving. Achieve what you seek. Seeing a galaxy in a dream indicates science and knowledge. Whoever sees that he is looking at galaxies in the sky in a dream will gain useful knowledge and great knowledge, and if you see yourself lost among galaxies in a dream, this indicates a lack of perception and wisdom. Traveling through space indicates In a dream, to a change in circumstances and things for the better, and whoever dreams that he is traveling in space with someone he knows, this means that he will get something better from him. And God knows best. The meaning of a spaceship in a dream: Seeing a spaceship in a dream indicates many big desires and goals. Riding a spaceship in a dream shows courage and risk in the pursuit, and whoever sees that he is afraid to ride a spaceship in a dream will gain comfort and peace after being tired. Riding a spaceship indicates In the sky in a dream to the achievement of aspirations and goals, and anyone who sees a spaceship descending to Earth in a dream will not reach his goals and objectives. Since a spaceship in a dream symbolizes smart and wise actions, and riding in a spaceship in a dream, this indicates wisdom and intelligence in Pursuing it. A dream about a spaceship exploding indicates weak efforts and failure in work. Interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream. Symbol of space flight in a dream. Dreaming of flying in space indicates attaining glory and honor, and may indicate an increase in status. Seeing flying in space in a dream may indicate To aspire to great and higher positions, and the fear of flying in space in a dream indicates remaining in confusion and hesitation in making decisions, and flying in space and falling into a dream indicates the pursuit of fame. And status without taking reasons. Flying among the clouds in a dream indicates a lot of hope and hope. Seeing a famous person flying in space in a dream indicates his high status and status among people, and dreaming of a flying human being among relatives indicates an increase in status and good reputation among people, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing yourself flying in a dream. Seeing space and planets in a dream. Ibn Sirin said that seeing space and planets in a dream means the most noble sultans, the most knowledgeable scholars, and the richest people. And whoever sees planets falling from space in a dream, this means that
